views.markdown:
Hotfix for a bug: iOS 10.0.x was detected as iOS 9, and iOS 9 part of the code was loaded instead of iOS 10. iOS 10 compatibility Added a new optional text box style for iOS 10 users Fixes button animation on iOS 9.2 and above Fixed Apple Music alert when using CleanSheets.
Fixed UIActionSheet's scroll lag when using CleanSheets.
Palert is disabled by default in CrashReporter to avoid current and future issues.
Improved pop up time of alert windows.
Fixes an issue with the resizing of wallpaper when wallpaper mode was enabled
Fixes that after wallpaper change you had to respring in order to apply it for Palert on iOS 9

New:
Added option for bordered buttons

Fixed alert centering issue on iOS 8.
Fixed Eclipse compatibility bugs on iOS 9.

Fixed a bug that caused the alert buttons to become unresponsive in some cases.
Fixed a bug that sometimes resized text input alerts multiple times


Fixed issue when BioProtect's text label did not change color
Fixed issue when Touch ID authentication did not change text color
Fixed issue that Alert Scale did not affect the size of notification alerts
Fixed button "flash"
